Sentencas: Solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) technology is promising.
Titulo: Performance characteristics of a solid oxide fuel cell hybrid jet engine under different operating modes

Sentencas: Jet engines can be integrated with SOFCs (SOFC hybrid jet engine) for aircraft.
Titulo: Performance characteristics of a solid oxide fuel cell hybrid jet engine under different operating modes

Sentencas: The specific thrust of the engine is greatly improved by replacing turbines with SOFC systems.
Titulo: Performance characteristics of a solid oxide fuel cell hybrid jet engine under different operating modes

Sentencas: Four operating modes are designed for the engine to achieve about 50% similar to 100% thrust variation.
Titulo: Performance characteristics of a solid oxide fuel cell hybrid jet engine under different operating modes

Sentencas: Mode 1: Regulating the fuel flow in the reformer under the constant air flow for the SOFC system.
Titulo: Performance characteristics of a solid oxide fuel cell hybrid jet engine under different operating modes

Sentencas: Mode 2: Regulating the fuel flow in the afterburner with zero fresh air for afterburners.
Titulo: Performance characteristics of a solid oxide fuel cell hybrid jet engine under different operating modes

Sentencas: Mode 3: Regulating the fuel and air flow for the SOFC.
Titulo: Performance characteristics of a solid oxide fuel cell hybrid jet engine under different operating modes

Sentencas: Mode 4: Regulating the fuel flow in the afterburner with constant air flow for afterburners.
Titulo: Performance characteristics of a solid oxide fuel cell hybrid jet engine under different operating modes

Sentencas: The performance and thermodynamic parameters of the engine under different operating modes are examined and compared according to the built mathematical models.
Titulo: Performance characteristics of a solid oxide fuel cell hybrid jet engine under different operating modes

Sentencas: The simulation results show that the effects of operating modes on the engine are remarkably different from that on the traditional SOFC gas turbine hybrid systems for electricity generation.
Titulo: Performance characteristics of a solid oxide fuel cell hybrid jet engine under different operating modes

Sentencas: All of the parameters of components change sharply in modes 1 and 3, and the thermal efficiency of the engine increases respectively from 0.577 to 0.687 and 0.491 to 0.687 with the increase of load.
Titulo: Performance characteristics of a solid oxide fuel cell hybrid jet engine under different operating modes

Sentencas: The component parameters of the engine are slightly changed in modes 2 and 4 except the parameters related to the afterburner.
Titulo: Performance characteristics of a solid oxide fuel cell hybrid jet engine under different operating modes

Sentencas: In mode 2, the thermal efficiency decreases from 0.577 to 0.454.
Titulo: Performance characteristics of a solid oxide fuel cell hybrid jet engine under different operating modes

Sentencas: It decreases from 0.491 to 0.434 in mode 4.
Titulo: Performance characteristics of a solid oxide fuel cell hybrid jet engine under different operating modes

Sentencas: In a nutshell, the performance of the engine can be varied in a wide range under the operating model 4 with increasing the afterburner temperature from 832 K to 2261 K.
Titulo: Performance characteristics of a solid oxide fuel cell hybrid jet engine under different operating modes

Sentencas: The operating mode 4 is the best.
Titulo: Performance characteristics of a solid oxide fuel cell hybrid jet engine under different operating modes
